description.translate: As impertinent as their privileges are, it would be costly for its owner to get rid of them.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Fortune de la comtesse\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aAussi impertinents que sont leurs privilèges,\"}","{\"text\":\"§ail coûterait à sa détentrice de s'en passer.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aAs impertinent as their privileges are,\"}","{\"text\":\"§ait would be costly for its owner to get rid of them.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a1 §7HER§a1\"}"]}}
